title: feature request - link connection panel to tab
author: TonyRoo2
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
feature request, it is very annoying (and dangerous) to have the connection panel links not affect the tab; I constantly am clicking on the server/connection in the connections panel and then think I am now working on that server, as it is has been chosen and is highlighted, but I am not; I have done work on the incorrect server several times because of this. comments.author: TonyRoo2
comments.snippet: to add to/clarify the above, I have since realized that if I double-click a connection in the connection panel, it does go to the already open tab of that connection; I think a single click should also do this if the tab is open already, as otherwise a connection can be highlight in the panel yet not be the active tab.
